Posts.Content: May 18, 2010 05:19PM - edited May 18, 2010 05:20PM by MommyTo4GreatKiddos I'm new to this forum and yes, I am scheduled to start chemo this Thursday, May 20.  I'll be doing the TAC regimen, once every three weeks for six treatments.  I'd love the support of others going through the same thing.  I'm not excited about starting (obviously) but I will be happy to have this behind me!
